hero.description: I love turning ideas into code. Passionate about building smart, user-friendly, high-performance and scalable software.

content.part1: I'm <1>Stepan Blaha </1>, a Web developer and Computer Science student with 2+ years of experience. I specialize in building clean, responsive, and dynamic websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Typecsript, React, NextJs, MySQL and MongoDB.
content.part2: I'm currently studying at <1>SPS Prosek</1> in my third year.
content.part3: I'm always learning and leveling up my skills because i believe that <1>no matter how good you are, you can always get better</1>. Currently im diving deeper into NextJs and backend. I'm always open to new challenges and opportunities thanks to which i can build cool stuff and grow in the process.
content.part4: When I'm not coding or at school you can usually find me in the gym working out, on the court playing basketball with my friends or watching the newset episode of <1>Oɴᴇ PɪᴇᴄE</1>

marquee: ✦ INTERACTIVE ✦ SECURE ✦ RELIABLE ✦ ENGAGING ✦ ACCESSIBLE ✦ RESPONSIVE ✦ DYNAMIC ✦ SCALABLE ✦ SEARCH OPTIMIZED

projects.description: Here are some of the projects I’ve worked on recently. Each one gave me a chance to explore different tools, frameworks, and workflows in real-world scenarios. I’ve built everything from interactive frontend interfaces to backend APIs, focusing on clean code and good UX. These projects reflect both what I’ve learned so far and what I’m still improving.<2></2> For more, visit my
